Name: Review of data requested through FOIL for inclusion on the open data portal.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the review of data requested through FOIL for inclusion on the open data portal

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Technology
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor
This Introduction was Recved from Mayor by Council

Summary: This bill would require agencies to review freedom of information law requests that include the release of data for inclusion of that data on the open data portal.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Section 23-502 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to add a new subdivision f to read as follows: 
	f. Agencies shall review responses to freedom of information law requests that include the release of data to determine if such responses consist of or include public data sets that have not yet been included on the single web portal or the inclusion of which on the single web portal is not provided for in the compliance plan prepared pursuant to section 23-506. Each agency shall disclose in the update to such compliance plan the total number, since the last update, of such agency's freedom of information law responses that included the release of data, the total number of such responses determined to consist of or include a public data set that had not yet been included on the single web portal and the total number of such responses that resulted in voluntarily disclosed information being made accessible through the single web portal.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.

BJR
LS #3891
11/23/15  4:08PM
